Text:
Virex 7.6 will not work with 10.4.x, only on 10.2 or 10.3

Virex 7.7 is the version needed for 10.4

Fuck virex, yo.  This software made my mac all batty (and that was a legit copy too!)  

I use clamXav now... free open source app.  Smooth sailing.

Virex isn't worth half a bucket of piss.
